long_description: Yes, you can do yoga in these. And hike, boulder and skip stones at the seashore. The women's prAna Jasmine Knickers give you plenty of stretch, options and relaxation. Stretchy nylon/spandex fabric features a durable water repellent finish to bead up water so it rolls off. Quick drying, a boon if you slip off your paddleboard. Gusset adds comfort and freedom of movement. Adjustable waist and snap-front closure allow an easy fit. The prAna Jasmine knickers offer pleats at the knees, front slant pockets, back welt pockets and a low rise.
short_description: Yes, you can do yoga in these. And hike, boulder and skip stones at the seashore. The women's prAna Jasmine Knickers give you plenty of stretch, options and relaxation.
